previewArticle.title: New York Red Bulls vs. Philadelphia Union | MLS Match Preview

recapArticle.title: New York Red Bulls 2, Philadelphia Union 1 | MLS Match Recap

timelineItems.desc: A key match for a pair of Eastern Conference teams with real aspirations at midweek as the New York Red Bulls play host to Philadelphia Union at Red Bull Arena.
timelineItems.title: KICKOFF: New York Red Bulls vs. Philadelphia Union

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.
Attempt missed. Maurice Edu (Philadelphia Union) left footed shot from outside the box misses to the right. Assisted by Leonardo Fernandes.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Thierry Henry (New York Red Bulls) right footed shot from the center of the box is too high.
timelineItems.title: MISS: A Thierry Henry scissor kick attempt flies over the bar

timelineItems.comment: Bradley Wright-Phillips (New York Red Bulls) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Fabinho (Philadelphia Union).

timelineItems.name: Tomek Moczerniuk
timelineItems.text: No @MattMiazga3 on the bench tonight for the #RBNY as he’s playing for US U20 team in #DallasCup2014. Young Yanks are taking on Tigres today

timelineItems.name: OptaJack
timelineItems.text: 5 - @NewYorkRedBulls are undefeated at home against Philadelphia in @MLS play (4W 1D). Protection. #NYvPHI

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Thierry Henry (New York Red Bulls) right footed shot from the centre of the box is too high. Assisted by Lloyd Sam with a cross.

timelineItems.name: Diego Steve Principe
timelineItems.text: #RBNY #REDBULLS

timelineItems.name: Franco Panizo
timelineItems.text: Red Bulls targeting Gaddis, but Fabinho to me is the bigger question mark defensively. Surprised it's not him they are going after. #RBNY

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Andrew Wenger (Philadelphia Union) left footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the bottom right corner.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Luis Robles stops an Andrew Wenger one on one attempt

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Andrew Wenger (Philadelphia Union) left footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Cristián Maidana.

timelineItems.name: Dan Dickinson
timelineItems.text: Bad turnovers coming from both teams rapidly now. #RBNY #DOOP

timelineItems.comment: Hand ball by Péguy Luyindula (New York Red Bulls).

timelineItems.name: Dave Zeitlin
timelineItems.text: Terrific run and pass by Maidana to Wenger, who put a shot on target but not a particularly good one.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Cristián Maidana (Philadelphia Union) left footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Leonardo Fernandes.

timelineItems.name: MLS Talk
timelineItems.text: Maidana playing like how he played Portland #DOOP

timelineItems.name: Jimbo Lamb
timelineItems.text: I think that run should be called the Wenger Run: sudden burst of speed behind the d on far side @andrewwenger #DOOP

timelineItems.desc: Fabinho (Philadelphia Union) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: A Fabinho challenge earns him a yellow card

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Fabinho (Philadelphia Union).
Kosuke Kimura (New York Red Bulls) wins a free kick on the right wing.

timelineItems.name: onelove
timelineItems.text: Think this is the most compose @PhilaUnion team in the 5yrs I've seen! There is just something extra!! #DOOP/ #PayGaddis plays every minute

timelineItems.name: Pablo Maurer
timelineItems.text: Shep Messing reaches new levels of hyperbole. "THE WORST THING IN THE WORLD IS AN UNFORCED ERROR." Yeah. No. #MLS #RBNY

timelineItems.comment: Andrew Wenger (Philadelphia Union) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Dax McCarty (New York Red Bulls).
Offside, Philadelphia Union. Aaron Wheeler tries a through ball, but Andrew Wenger is caught offside.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Thierry Henry (New York Red Bulls) left footed shot from a difficult angle and long range on the left is high and wide.
timelineItems.title: CHANCE: Thierry Henry takes early speculative shot

timelineItems.name: Joe Tansey
timelineItems.text: It looks like the Union are in a 4-1-3-2 with Leo Fernandes up front with Wenger. Le Toux on right, Maidana on left to start. #DOOP #NYvPHI

timelineItems.name: Franco Panizo
timelineItems.text: Henry struggling a bit with his touches today. Red Bulls have ceded possession few times now because of it. #RBNY

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Bradley Wright-Phillips (New York Red Bulls) right footed shot from the center of the box is saved in the bottom right corner.
timelineItems.title: CHANCE: A back heel attempt from Bradley Wright-Phillips is stopped by MacMath

timelineItems.name: Dan Dickinson
timelineItems.text: #RBNY have escaped the first fifteen minutes without conceding, which has been their worst interval so far this year (3 allowed).

timelineItems.comment: Match ends, New York Red Bulls 2, Philadelphia Union 1.

timelineItems.desc: Dan Haiek and Armchair Analyst Matt Doyle preview the midweek match between Eastern Conference foes the New York Red Bulls and Philadelphia Union. Can Philadelphia collect the points their performance deserves? What does New York need to do to earn their first win? Find out Wednesday at 730pm ET on MLS Live.
timelineItems.title: New York Red Bulls vs. Philadelphia Union April 16, 2014 Preview | Scouting Report

timelineItems.desc: Dan Haiek and Armchair Analyst Matt Doyle preview the midweek match between Eastern Conference foes the New York Red Bulls and Philadelphia Union. Can Philadelphia collect the points their performance deserves? What does New York need to do to earn their first win? Find out Wednesday at 730pm ET on MLS Live.

timelineItems.text: GOAL #RBNY! Give it up to ROY MILLER. Great back heel pass, finds Henry wide open. Age or not, he wont miss from that spot. 1-0! #NYvPHI

timelineItems.name: Rob Umbria
timelineItems.text: Roy Miller: perfect pass Thierry Henry: perfect finish absolutely lethal. Let's go boys #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Dave Zeitlin
timelineItems.text: The Union need a goal and a spark. Conor Casey scored three goals against the Red Bulls last year. He also happens to be on their bench.

timelineItems.text: 3 - @PhilaUnion's Conor Casey has scored 3 goals in his last 3 appearances against New York in @MLS. Incoming. #NYvPHI

timelineItems.name: TheFaust
timelineItems.text: Loyd Sam killer crossover, almost broke his own ankles. #RBNY

timelineItems.name: OptaJack

timelineItems.text: Henry just told Alexander "That's twice" love it #RBNY

timelineItems.name: OptaJack
timelineItems.text: 2 - After losing 5 consecutive @MLS games against NY, @PhilaUnion have gone 2 undefeated keeping clean sheets in both. Confident. #NYvPHI

timelineItems.name: Dan Dickinson
timelineItems.text: New York has 10 minutes to kill this game off. Philly can smell blood. Expect a wild finish. #RBNY #DOOP

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: RED CARD! Sekagya sent off + @PhilaUnion have a PK: http://t.co/QtGccshJH4 #NYvPHI

timelineItems.desc: Jamison Olave (New York Red Bulls) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Jamison Olave draws a yellow for a foul on Nogueira

timelineItems.comment: Hand ball by Thierry Henry (New York Red Bulls).
Vincent Nogueira (Philadelphia Union) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Jamison Olave (New York Red Bulls).

timelineItems.name: Tomek Moczerniuk
timelineItems.text: “Freezing" Le Toux did not work. The French puts Union on the board and with one man up & 10 mins left this game is still wide open. #RBNY

timelineItems.comment: Delay in match Thierry Henry (New York Red Bulls) because of an injury.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: GOAL! Le Toux converts and @PhilaUnion have 10 minutes to equalize. #RBNY 2, Philly 1: http://t.co/IiM05NqNXW #NYvPHI

timelineItems.comment: Delay over. They are ready to continue.

timelineItems.name: Michael Heinz
timelineItems.text: Henry just got clipped like he was playing Luis Suarez. Union and Liverpool fan friend of mine disagrees. #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: At 7:30pm ET, @NewYorkRedBulls look to nab their first W of 2014: http://t.co/XQmej7b0aR #NYvPHI http://t.co/Bo4WQnELiG

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: At 7:30pm ET, @NewYorkRedBulls look to nab their first W of 2014: http://t.co/XQmej7b0aR #NYvPHI http://t.co/Bo4WQnELiG

timelineItems.name: Jen M.
timelineItems.text: Warmups. #RBNY  #COYRB #EmpireSupportersClub #ESC

timelineItems.name: Aidan Porter
timelineItems.text: Let's go #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Mark Fishkin
timelineItems.text: Scarves Up.  #RBNY @newyorkredbulls

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Maurice Edu (Philadelphia Union) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Vincent Nogueira.

timelineItems.name: Shakespeare O'Shiße
timelineItems.text: Petke really needs to bring on Lade or Christianson for Henry here. #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: .@PhilaUnion down 2-1 with 5 minutes + stoppage. RT @TheUMatchDay: 85' Red Bulls currently with NINE men on pitch. #NYvPHI

timelineItems.name: RAFFLCOPTER
timelineItems.text: Hoping the U has some more late game heroics left in them. #DOOP

timelineItems.desc: Thierry Henry (New York Red Bulls) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Thierry Henry fouls Wheeler and draws a yellow card

timelineItems.name: Patrick MacDonald
timelineItems.text: I believe that we will win #RBNY

timelineItems.comment: Vincent Nogueira (Philadelphia Union) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Thierry Henry (New York Red Bulls).
Foul by Thierry Henry (New York Red Bulls).
Aaron Wheeler (Philadelphia Union) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Dave Martinez
timelineItems.text: Steele getting ready to come in for #RBNY #NYvPHI

timelineItems.name: Dave Martinez
timelineItems.text: Fearless defending by Gaddis. Rare to see Henry stripped so clearly in a 1v1. #RBNY #NYvPHI

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Thierry Henry (New York Red Bulls).
Raymon Gaddis (Philadelphia Union) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Corner,  Philadelphia Union. Conceded by Roy Miller.
Jamison Olave (New York Red Bulls) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Aaron Wheeler (Philadelphia Union).

timelineItems.name: Isaac
timelineItems.text: Yeah that's definitely a yellow looking at the replay #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Franco Panizo
timelineItems.text: Four minutes of stoppage time. #RBNY #DOOP

timelineItems.name: Brazilians In New York
timelineItems.text:
regram @bella056
a little soccer game never killed nobody.⚽️ #happygirl #rbny #nowherefc

timelineItems.comment: Lloyd Sam (New York Red Bulls) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Fabinho (Philadelphia Union).

timelineItems.name: Patrick MacDonald
timelineItems.text: That was a great play by Sam from the tackle onto taking it to the corner #RBNY

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Armando (New York Red Bulls).
Conor Casey (Philadelphia Union) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Conor Casey (Philadelphia Union).
Armando (New York Red Bulls) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Lisa Richardson
timelineItems.text: Chewing my scarf like Sigi Schmid. #NYvPHI #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Matthew Levine
timelineItems.text: Henry leaving to rousing applause. Steele on to finish the final minute. #RBNY #DOOP

timelineItems.name: Dan Dickinson
timelineItems.text: Gestures indicating Salazar adding one more minute of stoppage, from the looks of it. #RBNY #DOOP

timelineItems.name: Graham Parker
timelineItems.text: Thierry Henry departs blowing a kiss to Philadelphia fans, with whom he appears to feel a special affinity #RBNY #DOOP

timelineItems.name: jesus barbs
timelineItems.text: Finally our first win #NYRB

timelineItems.name: OptaJack
timelineItems.text: 10 - The team that scores first has now won all 10 @MLS meetings btw @NewYorkRedBulls and @PhilaUnion (1 scoreless draw). Crucial. #NYvPHI

timelineItems.comment: Second Half ends, New York Red Bulls 2, Philadelphia Union 1.
Lineups are announced and players are warming up.
